Text: Why aren't there any instructions on how to install this Crack?

Well, since there are no instructions I guess I'll detail them for all of you. 

1) Install the Sandboxie Installer but don't run it

2) Shut down the SbieSvc.exe & SbieCtrl.exe services through the task manager

3) Copy the Crack folder contents & replace(Paste) them in the Sandboxie folder (C:/Program Folders/Sandboxie)

4) Restart your computer

5) Open your Sanboxie Control box click Help then click About Sandboxie & it should state that Sandboxie is registered & licensed for life


So thanks for this .Dude.
